properties.name: BFR K15
properties.site-address: Desborough Leisure Centre, Off Broadlands, Desborough, NN14 2YH
properties.notes: For BFR assessment purposes it is assumed that development will only happen on the PDL element of site (and not the larger, wider site which includes extensive tracts of Greenfield). To derive these estimates it has been calculated that only 30% of the wider site is PDL so 70% of the overall site has been discounted for development, hence the minimum figure propsed of 46 net dwellings used.. KET/2016/0044 - Residential development up to 304 dwellings - Outline. Appeal allowed. (APP/L2820/W/16/3162430). Previously assessed through SHLAA as site 1165. http://www.nnjpu.org.uk/publications/docdetail.asp?docid=1323

properties.name: BFR K17
properties.site-address: Land At Bosworth's Nursery And Garden Centre, Finedon Road, Burton Latimer, NN15 5QA
properties.notes: KET/2013/0750 - Residential development for up to 69 no. dwellings with access. KET/2016/0883 - Reserved matters approved 08.06.2018. Previously assessed through SHLAA as site 2185. http://www.nnjpu.org.uk/publications/docdetail.asp?docid=1323
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BFR K2
properties.site-address: Scott Road Garages, Scott Road, Kettering, NN16 9JY
properties.notes: Previously assessed through SHLAA as site 705. Council owned site. Preference would be for affordable housing on site. Different dwelling capaciites have been calculated for the site dependent on potential densities to be applied (taking account of the surrounding area). These entail either 17 houses at 50dph or 12 houses at 35 dph and these values take account (exclude) an area of the site under which a sewer easement runs.. A sewer easement crosses the site.

properties.name: BFR K3
